template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a multi-case customer support automation workflow for a {business_type} that involves triage, automatic resolution of simple issues, escalation of complex cases, and performance tracking; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a multi-case customer support automation workflow for a managed hosting provider that involves triage, automatic resolution of simple issues, escalation of complex cases, and performance tracking; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Design a managed hosting support workflow that triages tickets, auto-fixes simple issues, escalates complex cases, and tracks performance.
message.reasoning_content:
Okay, the user wants a single-sentence prompt under 40 words for a managed hosting support workflow. Let me break down their requirements.

First, they mentioned multi-case automation, so the prompt needs to cover different scenarios. Triage, auto-resolution for simple issues, escalation for complex ones, and performance tracking are key elements.

Hmm, need to make sure all these points are included without going over the word limit. Maybe start with "Design a workflow" to keep it active and concise. Then list the steps in order: triage, auto-fix, escalate, track.

Wait, is "managed hosting provider" necessary? The user specified it, so yes, include that context. Keep it flowing naturally without cramming too many details. Check the word count... okay, under 40. That should cover everything they asked for.
